DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine investigational drug effective safe individual COPD ( chronic pulmonary disease )
DOC.brief_title: Study In Subjects With COPD ( Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis COPD history cigarette smoking . Exclusion criterion : Significant heart lung disease associate COPD . Significant stomach intestinal disease .
